Call your local Wellen Park Golf & CC real estate team, PROGRAM Realty at (941) 999-9900, for comprehensive help in the real estate market in Venice. Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Real Estate ﻿ There are currently 251 individual home sites planned for development under Lennar Homes. Lennar Homes are offering homes from up to 5 of their exclusive and highly-sought after collections. Lennar is offering a unique and vast selection of single-family homes and condominiums within Wellen Park Golf & Country Club. Of the 251 home sites, Lennar is planning for 65 executive homes, 52 veranda-style condominiums, 39 estate homes, 1 coach home, and 94 terrace condominiums. Floorplans will start at around 1,100 square feet up to 3,500 square feet. Lennar Homes provide many innovative and flexible features which include thousands in add-ons that come included with their homes for free. Including automated home technologies, ring security cameras, remote water shutoff, remote air condition controls, smart appliances, and much more. HOA fees are expected to be around $760. Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Real Amenities This community has been designed and built from the ground up with amenities and recreational activities in mind. The main feature is the full 18-hole golf course and clubhouse. Residents will be able to enjoy world-class golf opportunities along with other resort-style amenities provided at the community clubhouse. Hotwire Communications will be the primary provider for cable, internet, and phone. Hotwire offers fiber optic cable with is allows incredibly high-speed internet that is dependable and much faster than the national average. Perhaps one of the most exciting facts about living at Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is its close location to the future Down Wellen area. Downtown Wellen will be a sprawling hub dedicated to endless shopping, dining, and recreational activities. Downtown Wellen will even feature an 80-acre lake for kayaking, along with nature and wellness jogging trails, pedestrian-friendly streets, and much more. Home - Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content BOOK A TEE TIME Follow us on Facebook Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Home Golf TEE TIMES Course Details Rates Facilities Instruction Lennar Family Golf Dining Calendar Real Estate Contact Contact Us E Club Signup Menu Home Golf TEE TIMES Course Details Rates Facilities Instruction Lennar Family Golf Dining Calendar Real Estate Contact Contact Us E Club Signup Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Escape the Ordinary | Experience ICONic Service | Enjoy Pristine Conditions About Our Course Welcome to Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Browse our inventory and book your next round of golf online It’s fast and easy Book Online Take your love of the game to the next level 2025 membership applications are now available Membership We offer one on one and group lessons for players of all ages. Get in touch with our pro shop staff for more info Instruction Register with us to receive regular offer specials and golf promotions eClub Signup Welcome to Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Wellen Park Golf & Country Club is located in Venice, Florida. Conveniently located near Downtown Wellen, Wellen Park Golf & Country Club has close access to all your favorite shops and entertainment, as well as the community’s network of paths and trails for walking, running and biking. The 18 hole golf course will challenge all types of players and plays roughly 7000 yards from the back tees.  We also offer multiple tees which allows all players to enjoy the course without being too difficult. Come and enjoy a unique golf experience near Florida’s Gulf Coast at Wellen Park Golf & Country Club. CLICK HERE FOR DIRECTIONS TO OUR COURSE Wellen Park Golf & Country Club 12060 Wellen Golf Street, Venice, Florida 34293 From I-75 North or South Take exit 191 (River Road/Route 777).  Head south on River Road for 2.9 miles. Take a right at West Villages Parkway, at the light go straight. Continue past Cool Today Park (Braves stadium).  At the roundabout, take the second right and stay on West Villages Parkway.  After .2 miles, turn right onto Wellen Golf Street, the parking lot and trailer are a few hundred yards from the entrance. Call 941-406-9200 if you have any questions. Page Footer About Us Prepare yourself for an unparalleled golfing experience. Our course is a pleasure for golfers of any skill level to play. Test your accuracy with our fairways, water hazards and sand traps; we have everything you need to challenge you and improve your game. Stop by our fully-stocked pro shop before or after your next round, browse through name brands and make sure you have all that you need to compliment your game. Our friendly staff will also help you schedule start times, rent golf carts, and register before each round of golf.  An excellent selection of clubs are available, too, and we encourage you to sign up for golf lessons. Contact the pro shop for assistance, or to make an appointment for lessons. Practice Facilities Wellen Park Golf & Country Club offers chipping and putting areas, a perfect place to improve your short game. Wellen Park Golf & Country Club is also equipped with a driving range. What better way to push your game to the next level this season? We encourage you to set aside some time to perfect your swing and improve your accuracy. Wellen Park Golf and Country Club condos for sale are located within a luxurious community in the highly-coveted Playmore District of Wellen Park in Venice, Florida. Built by Lennar, this bundled golf course community offers hundreds of condominiums for sale. With floor plans ranging from 1,120 to 1,569 square feet, these homes feature the latest in modern amenities including a resort-style pool, state-of-the-art fitness center, and the clubhouse.  Residents can take a stroll along the walking trails or spend time with your putter at the crown jewel of the neighborhood – the 18-hole championship golf course located right on property. If residents wish to try a different course outside of the community, there are several other world-class golf courses, including the Plantation Golf and Country Club and the Jacaranda West Country Club located nearby. Wellen Park Golf and Country Club condominiums are located near several other popular attractions, including the Myakka River State Park, which offers hiking trails, fishing, and wildlife viewing opportunities. The community is also near the historic Spanish Point, a 30-acre museum and environmental complex featuring prehistoric archaeological sites, gardens, and nature trails. Additionally, the nearby Legacy Trail offers 10 miles of paved trails for biking, walking, and jogging, while the Oscar Scherer State Park is perfect for camping, kayaking, and birdwatching. Additional Wellen Park Golf and Country Club Condo Information Wellen Park Golf and Country Club condominiums are a short drive away from public beaches, including the renowned Venice Beach and Caspersen Beach. These beaches offer more than just sunbathing and swimming. At Venice Beach, you can explore the Venice Fishing Pier, play beach volleyball, or rent a kayak or paddleboard to explore the Gulf of Mexico. Caspersen Beach is famous for its shark teeth hunting, where you can sift through the sand to find prehistoric shark teeth and other fossils. The beach also offers hiking trails, picnic areas, and opportunities to spot wildlife such as dolphins and manatees. Whether you prefer a relaxing day in the sun or an adventurous outing, the nearby beaches offer something for everyone. The Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport, approximately 38 miles away from Wellen Park Golf and Country Club condos, makes travel a breeze, with a variety of domestic and international flights available. Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is more than just a community; it’s a lifestyle. The community offers an unparalleled lifestyle in one of Florida’s most sought-after areas. From the moment you enter the community, you’ll be immersed in luxury living at its finest. With its world-class amenities, including a resort-style pool, state-of-the-art fitness center, and a clubhouse, you know you’ll be living alongside comfort and convenience. Wellen Park Golf and Country Club Condominiums Frequently Asked Questions How large is the Wellen Park Golf and Country Club condo community in Venice? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club has plans to build over 1,300 homes and condominium units, built between 2022-2027. Is there a pool in Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Yes, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club has a heated pool. Is Wellen Park Golf and Country Club in Venice a gated community? Yes, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is a gated community. Is Wellen Park Golf and Country Club in Venice located in a golf community? Yes, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is located in a 18 hold championship golf course community. How far is Wellen Park Golf and Country Club from downtown Sarasota? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is located about 33.6 miles from downtown Sarasota. What public beach is closest to Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is located about 12.9 miles from Manasota Key beach. How far is the Sarasota International Airport from Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is located about 38 miles from the Sarasota International Airport. Are pets allowed in Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Yes, however we recommend that you consult with a Realtor to get specific pet policy info for this community. We are happy to help you. *Accuracy of info provided is not guaranteed.  All info must be verified before making a purchase decision. Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Homes For Sale | Venice, FL Skip to content Keyword Search Search (941) 265-2455 Search MLS ⟶ Homes Condos Lifestyles Research Contact Our Buyer's Agents: More Info Keyword Search Search MENU Toggle Menu Venice FL Homes For Sale Venice FL Condos For Sale Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Real Estate Listings & Community Guide listings Share: Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Homes For Sale | Venice, FL Golf Course New Construction Venice / Neighborhoods / Wellen Park Golf & Country Club Wellen Park Golf and Country Club Real Estate in Venice, FL Wellen Park Golf & Country Club homes for sale are nestled within 1 of 11 neighborhoods in the Wellen Park master-planned community located in beautiful Venice, Florida. This remarkable and currently semi-private bundled golf neighborhood offers 865 golf memberships, and a blend of homes, villas, and condos integrated within the gorgeous 18 hole championship golf course, along with a wealth of exclusive amenities that one would expect in a new golf and country club setting. Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is strategically located in the southern part of Venice, Sarasota County, offering residents easy access to both the region’s attractions and everyday conveniences. Boasting around 1,300 single-family homes, coach homes, and condominiums, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club real estate exudes an air of exclusivity and vibrancy. Construction of these homes commenced in the early 2020s and continues to this day, ensuring a mix of contemporary designs and architectural styles that cater to the most discerning tastes. One of the neighborhood’s crown jewels is its exquisite 18-hole championship golf course, designed by the renowned Arthur Hills. This beautifully landscaped course provides a challenging and picturesque backdrop for avid golfers. Residents choose to unwind and soak up the sun at the resort-style swimming pool, complete with poolside cabanas. Staying fit is a breeze with the state-of-the-art fitness center, and tennis enthusiasts can enjoy well-lit courts for matches and social events. Scenic walking and biking trails wind throughout the community, offering plenty of opportunities for leisurely strolls, socializing with neighbors, and bike rides. Wellen Park Adventure Park provides outdoor activities and events that all ages will enjoy. For a taste of history and culture, the charming downtown Venice area is just a short drive away, known for its quaint shops, top-notch restaurants, and cultural activities. While Wellen Park Golf and Country Club doesn’t provide direct beachfront access, it’s just a 15-20 minute drive from the stunning public beaches of Venice. Venice Beach and Caspersen Beach, with their pristine sands and serene Gulf waters, are perfect for sunbathing, swimming, and enjoying the natural beauty of the Gulf Coast.  Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport is conveniently located within a reasonable driving distance from Wellen Park Golf and Country Club, ensuring straightforward access to both domestic and international flights for residents who need to travel by air. Wellen Park Golf & Country Club in Venice offers a life of luxury and sophistication. With its stunning homes, championship golf, and a wide array of amenities, it provides residents with an exclusive and contemporary lifestyle. The convenience of being near Venice’s beautiful beaches and cultural attractions further enhances the neighborhood’s appeal, making it the ideal choice for those seeking luxury living in Venice, Florida. Wellen Park Golf and Country Club Real Estate Frequently Asked Questions How large is the Wellen Park Golf and Country Club neighborhood in Venice? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club has plans to build over 1,300 homes and condominium units, built between 2022-2027. Is there a community pool in Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Yes, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club has a resort style heated pool. Is Wellen Park Golf and Country Club a gated community ? Yes, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club in Venice is a gated community with gate attendant. Is Wellen Park Golf and Country Club in Venice a maintenance-free neighborhood? Yes, the HOA is responsible for the resident’s basic yard care. Does Wellen Park Golf and Country Club in Venice have a CDD ? Yes, Wellen Park Golf and Country Club has a CDD. (CDD stands for “Community Development District”. It is an additional tax assessment included on a property’s annual real estate tax bill, which pays for the initial and ongoing infrastructure cost for community development.) Does Wellen Park Golf and Country Club allow fences? The Wellen Park Golf and Country Club community does not appear to allow fencing, however this should be verified. How far is Wellen Park Golf and Country Club from downtown Sarasota? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is located about 33.6 miles from downtown Sarasota. What public beach is closest to Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Manasota Key is the closest public beach to Wellen Park Golf and Country Club, which is about 12.9 miles away. How far is the Sarasota International Airport from Wellen Park Golf and Country Club? Wellen Park Golf and Country Club is located about 38 miles from the Sarasota International Airport. Is the Wellen Park Golf and Country Club in Venice a pet-friendly neighborhood? Yes, pets are allowed, however we recommend that you consult with a Realtor to get specific pet policy info for this community. *Accuracy of info provided is not guaranteed. Public Golfers Click Here to Book a Tee Time Wellen Park Members Click Here to Book a Tee Time Wellen Park Members Click Here to Make a Lottery Request *Must provide proper identification to the front gate to access the property* Driving range balls are complimentary with your round up to 45 minutes before your tee time . Dress Code Golfers must wear proper golf attire at all times. • Men may not wear jeans, bathing attire, T-shirts, shirts without collars, gym shorts, tank tops, mesh shirts, cut-offs or tennis shorts. • Women may not wear jeans, bathing attire, T-shirts, gym shorts, tank tops, tube or halter tops, mesh shirts, or cut-offs. Dress shirts without collars are permitted; however, shirts must have a collar if they do not have sleeves. • Juniors – normal junior sportswear, which means shirts with a collar, decent length slacks or skirts. No cut-offs or jeans. • Anyone not conforming to the dress code outlined above will be asked to change before they will be allowed to play golf or use the golf driving range.
